quotes.quote: There is a direct correlation between how we look after our bodies and how productive we are.
Look at your sleep routine. What are the things that you can do to ensure that you have a better night's rest?
Productivity is often tied to our work. But if we train in this way, we bring a sense of productivity to every aspect of life.
Most of us have the ability to focus quite intensely for short periods, but most activities last a lot longer than just a short burst.
We're not trying to control the mind in any way. In fact, we're creating a framework in which we can observe the disorder of the mind.
We migth not always like what we find in the thinking mind. But no matter what we discover, there's no need to add guil to it.
It's important to recognize that our focus is taken away not only by our internal dialogue but also by what's going on around us.
If we view our emotions without judgement, then we can stop wishing they were some other way.
